temperature.docs:
Temperature.
  * **name** (**Required**, string): The name of the sensor.
  
  * **id** (*Optional*, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): Manually specify the ID used for code generation.
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  



*See also: [SHT4X Temperature and Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sht4x.html#configuration-variables)*

humidity.docs:
Relative Humidity.
  * **name** (**Required**, string): The name of the sensor.
  
  * **id** (*Optional*, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): Manually specify the ID used for code generation.
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  



*See also: [SHT4X Temperature and Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sht4x.html#configuration-variables)*

precision.docs:
**string**: The measurement precision, either `High`, `Med` or `Low`. Default is `High`.



*See also: [SHT4X Temperature and Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sht4x.html#configuration-variables)*

heater_power.docs:
**string**: The heater power, either `High`, `Med` or `Low`. Default is `High`.



*See also: [SHT4X Temperature and Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sht4x.html#configuration-variables)*

heater_time.docs:
**string**: The length of time to run the heater, either `Long` (1000ms) or `Short` (100ms). Default is `Long`.



*See also: [SHT4X Temperature and Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sht4x.html#configuration-variables)*

heater_max_duty.docs:
**float**: The maximum duty cycle of the heater (limited to `0.05`). Default is `0.0`, i.e. heater off.



*See also: [SHT4X Temperature and Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sht4x.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.



*See also: [SHT4X Temperature and Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sht4x.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: Manually specify the I²C address of the sensor. Default is `0x44`.



*See also: [SHT4X Temperature and Humidity Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sht4x.html#configuration-variables)*
